meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Vince Balzano Kathy Haas Molly Lalonde Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6855.

td.p: Vince Balzano, a production company associate originally from Summit, New Jersey
Kathy Haas, a museum curator from Haddonfield, New Jersey
Molly Lalonde, a pediatric nurse practitioner student from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,000)

tr.td: FROM SOUP TO NUTS
WHAT THEY ARE
I'M ON A BOAT!
ROMANTIC CLICHÉS
WHAT'S THE ATTRACTION?
HE'S SO MAN"LEY"

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Vince] It looks like a Social Security card, is that what you were going for?)
...
(Alex: [To Kathy] ...a income tax return, it looks like?)
(Kathy: That\'s what I was going for, but it was 1913, so...)
...
(Alex: Glenn Curtiss was an early aviation pioneer; he got the [*] No. 1; if you\'re interested, the Wright Brothers got 4 and 5.)
VinceWhat is a draft card? SSC card
$8,000
KathyWhat is a social security card income tax rel
$9,200
MollyWhat is the Verseille treaty?
$10,000
a pilot\'s license')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
